item.description: Structure Fire; INC#1695; 08:34PM; 4017 S Hooper Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N6RT2Z; Central-Alameda; Two story, single family dwelling well involved in fire with one other home exposed. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. LADWP added due to wires down. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E10 E14 E15 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E33 RA14 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1542; 07:28PM; 4510 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QZ056A; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 40 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a two story duplex. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E215 E233 E266 E33 E46 E66 RA14 RA46 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1542; 07:11PM; 4510 S Vermont Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QZ056A; Vermont Square; Two story apartment building with a well established attic fire. title.a: Update Cliff Rescue - Hoist Op 11/28/2023 INC#0415

item.description: Update Cliff Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0415; 09:25AM; 1 Point Fermin; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nw6hUE; San Pedro; LAFD Divers and LA County Lifeguards made contact with the patient (at waters edge) and moved him to the shore. Due to the dangerous tide conditions and the serious injuries sustained by the male patient (he is currently alert and talking), LAFD Air Ops is preparing for a hoist operation and will then provide air ambulance transport. No further details.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 E90 EM6 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA101 RA36 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Cliff Rescue, San Pedro; INC#0415; 08:48AM; 1 Point Fermin; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nw6hUE; San Pedro; LA County Lifeguard was first on scene and LAFD confirms one male patient, approximately 100' over the side of the cliff and is currently unresponsive. Firefighters are working to access the patient while LAFD Marine Division is launching LAFD divers from the boat to assist with LA County Lifeguards in the water.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM6 H0B H0C RA101 RH114 T48 T85 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Structure Fire - with injuries 11/28/2023 INC#0144

item.description: Update Structure Fire - with injuries; INC#0144; 06:26AM; 1585 E Vernon Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sJ9FTe; Central-Alameda; There are currently a total of three patients with two transported: 66yo M and 64yo F (from an exposed building) were transported with serious burn injuries, 30yo M was evaluated on scene and declined LAFD hospital transport. A total of seven buildings were impacted by fire with five of them deemed a total loss. The count for residents unable to be return to their homes due to damage is 17. American Red Cross and the LA City Emergency Management Department are providing immediate assistance. Per protocol, LAFD Arson Section will conduct the cause investigation.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AO1 AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E226 E233 E264 E266 E285 E29 E3 E33 E35 E447 E46 E9 E90 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 H7 HA7 HE1 HR3 PH1 PI3 RA14 RA15 RA17 RA21 RA246 RA46 RA803 RA814 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T1 T10 T15 T2 T21 T26 T3 T33 T64 T66 T85 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13 14; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire 11/28/2023 INC#0144

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0144; 04:43AM; 1585 E Vernon St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RjsBBg; #CentralAlameda #VernonFire; *Corrected Address* Over 140 LAFD Firefighters responded, with assistance from neighboring LA County FD crews, and extinguished the fire in 1 hour and 18 minutes. Firefighters found a multi-family residential building in the framing stages of construction at the center of the blaze. Crews went to work, getting water on the fire, defending neighboring homes, and evacuating residents in the surrounding area, as they navigated wires down from fire-damaged utility poles. The total number of people who were temporarily displaced is still yet-to-be tallied, but families will be able to get back to their homes later this morning. A small number of neighboring structures sustained partial mostly-exterior damage. A further report will be available at LAFD.org/news later today. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. Fire Investigators are on scene attempting to determine the cause.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AO1 AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E226 E233 E264 E266 E29 E3 E33 E447 E46 E9 E90 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 H7 HA7 HE1 HR3 PI3 RA14 RA15 RA17 RA21 RA246 RA46 RA803 RA814 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T1 T10 T15 T2 T21 T26 T3 T33 T64 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 11/28/2023 INC#0144

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0144; 04:30AM; 4342 S Lima St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46zIibR; #CentralAlameda; Over 140 firefighters are now assigned to this incident. Crews are making good progress on the formerly-massive flames. Firefighters set up structure protection hose lines, while others are assisting neighboring residents evacuate. PIO Captain Cody Weireter en route. ETA 4:40 AM.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AO1 AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E447 E46 E9 E90 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 H7 HA7 HR3 PI3 RA14 RA21 RA246 RA46 RA803 RA814 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T15 T2 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0144; 03:25AM; 4342 S Lima St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46zIibR; #CentralAlameda; Firefighters are on scene of a city-block-sized area of structures under construction, all on fire ("stick fire"), with additional structures threatened on all four sides.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC4 CM20 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E447 E46 E9 E95 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA21 RA246 RA46 RA803 RA814 SO1 SQ21 SQ95 T10 T15 T2 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0767; 11:36AM; 6844 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QWsgDa; #Hollywood; Firefighters found fire in one room on the first floor of the vacant commercial building. It took 30 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the flames. One firefighter sustained a non-life-threatening injury and will be transported for further care. Cause under investigation.; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 CM52 E227 E261 E61 E76 E82 RA76 RA82 SO1 T27 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
